key.name: media-type
key.summary: Preferred media type for encoding audio when recording
key.description: Preferred media type for encoding audio when recording. 'audio/x-vorbis' for Ogg Vorbis, or 'audio/mpeg' for MP3, for example. This is not a MIME type.

key.name: media-type-preset
key.summary: Maps media types to audio encoder preset names.
key.description: Maps media types to audio encoder preset names. If there is no mapping for a media type, the default encoder settings will be used.
